dc_title_s: "The Times" map of the Russo-Japanese war
dc_description_s: Relief shown by shading, hachures, and spot heights.; Insets: Sketch map of the railway from St. Petersburg and Moscow to Port Arthur and Vladivostock, scale [approximately 1:12,672,000] -- Port Arthur, scale [approximately 1:9,000] -- Plan of the approaches to Vladivostock, scale [approximately 1:203,892] -- South East England, on the same scale as the general map -- Plan of the Port of Niu-Chwang (Ying-Kau) and the mouth of the Liau, scale [approximately 1:72,900].|74 x 62 centimeters|Scale 1:205,000|General Map Collection
